issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

Premium helpdesk issue

http://helpdesk.appcelerator.net/tickets/2506

open a window pointing to JS within a subdirectory.
close it
re-open and it will fail.

{html}
fields.summary: iPhone: problem when opening windows JS within subdirectory

comments.body:
{html}

(from [f78bd44812d5b06b9d8668851bfe9ebda15d1c39]) - fixed regression problem with closing windows - added test case for closing windows within tab for both animated and non-animated properties on close - [#1016 state:resolved] fixed problem with re-opening window in subdirectory http://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/commit/f78bd44812d5b...

{html}
